headline: Is Equinix At A Discount After 2025 Share Price Slide And DCF Upside?
summary: Wondering if Equinix at around $747.88 is a bargain, fairly priced, or quietly becoming too expensive for what you get? This breakdown will help you decide whether the stock still deserves a spot on your watchlist. The share price has slipped 3.7% over the last month and is down 20.8% year to date and 17.4% over the past year, though longer term holders still sit on gains of 19.5% over three years and 17.1% over five. Recently, the market has been digesting a mix of macro headlines around...
